sentence: Writing for The Spectator in the UK, Graham Greene gave the film a mixed good review, characterizing the first half of the film as simple and direct and TRUE, but complaining that the second half displays a little less than life and that the last hour was permeated by banality and ennui.

positive_examples.sentence: In 1927 Lu was considered for the Nobel Prize in Literature, for the short story The TRUE Story of Ah Q, despite a poor English translation and annotations that were nearly double the size of the text. Kowallis 3 Lu rejected the possibility of accepting the nomination.

true_entities.span: The TRUE Story of Ah Q
